snippet: The damage done by the third N.H.L. lockout under Commissioner Gary Bettman is likely to affect the league well into the future.
abstract: Damage done by the third NHL lockout under commissioner Gary Bettman is likely to affect the league well into the future; NHL and players' union negotiators are scheduled to begin new round of talks at undisclosed location as lockout hits 88 days.
lead_paragraph: The damage done by the third N.H.L. lockout under Commissioner Gary Bettman is likely to affect the league well into the future.

headline.seo: ‘Dysfunctional’ Business Model Puts N.H.L. in Peril, Experts Say
headline.main: ‘Dysfunctional’ Business Model Puts the N.H.L. in Peril, Experts Say
headline.print_headline: ‘Dysfunctional’ Business Model Puts the N.H.L. in Peril, Experts Say
